alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 9:57AM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Aitkin and Crow Wing Counties. For the Mississippi At Aitkin...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Aitkin. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, A few homes become surrounded by water in the Cedarbrook neighborhood near Eagle Rd. The Aitkin city park becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent heavy rain will cause strong rises on the Mississippi River near Aitkin. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to 14.8 feet Saturday June 4th. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.2 feet on 05/18/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Aitkin 13.0 12.8 Mon 8 am CDT 12.7 13.1 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth.
